resources.string: Search by app or package names
Failed to extract apk file. See adb log for details.

It seems that this application cannot be extracted through regular way. It is okay for paid apps: android tries to protect them from copying. However they are still extractable on rooted devices. If your device is rooted, apkExtractor could try to extract it using root.
In order to write apk file application must be granted with \"Storage\" permission.\nPlease, open app\'s settings and grant \"Storage\" permission to it.
